product_name: OllyDog Flyer Flying Disc Dog Toy - Large - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Providing instant fun at the beach, park or campground, the large, eye-catching Flyer Flying Disc Dog Toy from OllyDog is easy to throw-and easy for your dog to catch. 12-in. disc has 3-layer construction for durability. Soft rim is easy on your dog's mouth. Floats in water. Easy for a dog to pick up disc is flat on the ground. Closeout.
short_description: Providing instant fun at the beach, park or campground, the large, eye-catching Flyer Flying Disc Dog Toy from OllyDog is easy to throw-and easy for your dog to catch.
